errors.wrong_password: Email address or password is incorrect.
errors.password_not_enough: Your password must be longer than 6 characters.
errors.invalid_verification_code: The code you entered is incorrect.
errors.too_many_requests: Too many requests sent. Please try again later.
errors.operation_not_allowed: Login with e-mail address is not allowed.
errors.email_already_exists: An account has already been created with this E-mail address. Please use another email address.
errors.account_already_exists: An account has already been created with this E-mail address. Please use another email address.
errors.credential_already_in_use: This login ID is associated with another account. Please try logging in with another account.
errors.invalid_credential: There is a problem with this input method. Please choose a different input method.
errors.expired_action_code: Your password reset code has expired.
errors.apple_unknown: An error occurred that cannot be identified by Apple.
errors.apple_cancelled: The user canceled the authorization attempt.
errors.apple_not_interactive: The authorization request is not interactive.
errors.apple_credential_error: Failed to retrieve Apple authorization credentials.
errors.email_send: If the email address is valid, you will receive a password reset email shortly.
errors.apple_unsupported_device: This device is not suitable for apple sign in.
errors.auth_validation_name_length: Name must be at least 3 characters.
errors.auth_validation_pw_length: Password must be at least 6 characters.

login.title: Login
login.dont_have_acc_txt: You don\'t have an account? Register

register.title: Register
register.have_account: Do you have an account? Sign In!

delete_account.alert_confirm: I want to delete my account.
delete_account.warning_one: Your data will be completely deleted
delete_account.warning_two: All your lists, including your favorites, will be deleted
delete_account.warning_three: You will not be able to recover your data
